content.rendered:
Buster Moon and his all-star team of animals are gearing up for their most spectacular super show yet…in the glitzy entertainment capital of the world. There’s just one catch: first they have to convince the world’s most reclusive rock star to join them. Buster and his team made the New Moon Theater a success, but Buster has set his sights on a bigger trophy: he wants to come up with a new show at the Crystal Tower Theater in the glittering Redshore City.

Directors: Garth Jennings. Christophe Lourdelet

Written By Garth Jennings

Stars: Matthew McConaughey. Reese Witherspoon. Scarlett Johansson
